segments.pli: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato tayo male appahāya yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: “Anyone who has three qualities, and has not given up three stains, is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Dussīlo ca hoti, dussīlyamalañcassa appahīnaṃ hoti;
segments.en: They’re unethical, and haven’t given up the stain of immorality.

segments.pli: issukī ca hoti, issāmalañcassa appahīnaṃ hoti;
segments.en: They’re jealous, and haven’t given up the stain of jealousy.

segments.pli: maccharī ca hoti, maccheramalañcassa appahīnaṃ hoti.
segments.en: They’re stingy, and haven’t given up the stain of stinginess.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato ime tayo male appahāya yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
segments.en: Anyone who has these three qualities, and has not given up these three stains, is cast down to hell.

segments.pli: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato tayo male pahāya yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
segments.en: Anyone who has three qualities, and has given up three stains, is raised up to heaven.

segments.pli: Sīlavā ca hoti, dussīlyamalañcassa pahīnaṃ hoti;
segments.en: They’re ethical, and have given up the stain of immorality.

segments.pli: anissukī ca hoti, issāmalañcassa pahīnaṃ hoti;
segments.en: They’re not jealous, and have given up the stain of jealousy.

segments.pli: amaccharī ca hoti, maccheramalañcassa pahīnaṃ hoti.
segments.en: They’re not stingy, and have given up the stain of stinginess.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato ime tayo male pahāya yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
segments.en: Anyone who has these three qualities, and has given up these three stains, is raised up to heaven.”
